key.name: watchlist
key.description: List of stock symbols in the watchlist

key.name: panel-stocks
key.description: List of stock symbols to display in the panel

key.name: desktop-widgets
key.description: List of stock symbols to display as desktop widgets

key.name: desktop-widget-positions
key.description: JSON object mapping stock symbols to their x,y positions

key.name: desktop-widget-opacity
key.description: Opacity of desktop widgets (0-100)

key.name: desktop-widget-scale
key.description: Scale factor for desktop widgets (0.5-2.0)

key.name: desktop-widget-show-chart
key.description: Whether to display the chart in desktop widgets

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Interval in seconds between stock price updates

key.name: font-size
key.description: Font size for the extension popup menu (8-24)

key.name: watchlist-label-order
key.description: Order of labels in watchlist items: symbol-first or name-first

key.name: watchlist-show-secondary-label
key.description: Show or hide the smaller secondary label in watchlist items

key.name: custom-stock-names
key.description: JSON object mapping stock symbols to custom display names

key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position of the indicator in the panel (left, center, right)

key.name: api-key
key.description: API key for stock data provider (optional for some providers)

key.name: chart-style
key.description: Style of chart display: line, bar, or candle

key.name: show-icon
key.description: Show or hide the main indicator icon in the panel

key.name: show-stock-icon
key.description: Show or hide stock icon/logo in panel buttons

key.name: show-stock-price
key.description: Show or hide stock price in panel buttons

key.name: show-stock-name
key.description: Show or hide stock symbol/name in panel buttons

key.name: show-stock-gain
key.description: Show or hide stock gain/change in panel buttons

key.name: widget-move-mode
key.description: When enabled, widgets are brought to front for repositioning
